name: Jelli Jumper!
description:
This game was made for the Score Space 21 Game Jam. Hope you enjoy!

The shader showing death area is not showing up at the bottom of the screen, assume that touching the bottom part of screen kills you.

Description:
Jelli Jumper is a fast paced infinite climber, featuring a slime where you build up momentum by diving down and bouncing off of platforms.

Controls:

Bouncing off platforms using your dive [S] will give you a massive boost into the air. 

The bar at the bottom is your score multiplier, collect powerups which include the slow-motion and in air jump , and dive your way to victory!

A/D: Left/Right

S: Dive down

Right Click/E/Space: Use Powerup/Ability
